trends: There has been one other sighting in Llano
There were no other sightings in Llano on or around September 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsOk, I took a picture two years ago and it keeps haunting me because of what turned up in when I reviewed the picture days later. First off, I completely believe we are not alone in this universe but I have never had any person proof, it's always been a gut feeling. I have sat staring at this picture for two years now trying my hardest to convenes myself that what I am seeing can be explained but now I am not sure about that and I wanted to submit the picture to you guys for review. I was out hunting with my friends and because their was no action that day we decided to go out by the pond and do some skeet shooting. I take lots of pictures so this event was something I wanted to capture for my memory book. When I reviewed the pictures after I got home one caught my eye and I could have sworn there is a huge flying disk in the sky and it freaked me out because it looks so real and it looks nothing like a plane or helicopter or anything I can make out. I did not see it in the sky at the time I took the picture and it does not appear in any of the other pictures I took at that location. I have not showed it to anyone nor have I tampered with it in anyway. I want you guys to take a look at it and tell me what you think! It might be nothing but I gotta know what yall think. Thanks guys!
